channel.title: [PI] Lil' Amsterdam {Apply Now!}
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/209sp79.jpg[/img][/center]
[font=verdana]Hello Moparscape Friends! I'm planning on starting a new server, a new project, a unique one! I will need a team for this since it will be alot of work to set it up and to keep it running. And I'll be honest with you, I'm not that much of a coder. I can do some basic things, like NPC dialogues, shops, etc but I have bigger features in mind. I do, however, have a lot of experience managing big servers, advertising them on the internet and managing a team.
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/30w2kbk.jpg[/img] So, some features I'm thinking of putting in are; -[b]Unique PvP-only characters[/b] (sealed of from the rest of the world) -[b]Unique extra features for donators[/b] -[b]Perfect economy[/b] -[b]Quests which require skill levels and are needed to use certain items[/b] -[b]Not too hard, yet challenging training / item getting[/b] -[b]Unique + basic minigames[/b] -[b]Loyal player rewards[/b] -[b]Actually listen to player suggestions[/b] [i]I have some more features in mind which we will discuss after we form a team.[/i]
Im planning on using a PI base, maybe using Vertigo (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,514816.0.html) since it is unique and we can expand it. [b]NOTE:[/b] THIS IS AN ENTIRE NEW PROJECT! Not just using that source, putting in 2 new shops in and changeing "Welcome to Vertigo!" to "Welcome to my crappy leechserver!".
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/sgpf83.jpg[/img] The goal is to create a new server, instead of another standard PI server with the same old NPC's, same home, same way of getting money, etc. I'm hoping to be able to have enough income from the server to pay the monthly costs after a month or 3. Until then [b]I will cover the costs of the host, the website, etc.[/b] So, help me offer players a new, unique server!
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/25i82nn.jpg[/img] Why would you join this team? I can offer you a team in which everyone has an equal vote and works together on a new, unique server. Ofcourse all team members will get Co-Owner status. And, since you are reading this, there's a big chance you like to work on servers. So why not pick this one?
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/oi7x5c.jpg[/img] What do I need?
Server-Sided coder: 0/2 Client-Sided coder: 0/1 Webdesigner: 1/1 GFX designer: 0/1
[b]Apply form:[/b] [i]Age: Experience in java: Position applying for: Why should i choose you?: Proof of work: Msn:[/i]
Thank you for reading![/font]

item.title: [PI] Lil' Amsterdam {Apply Now!}
item.dc:creator: @mrduck mrduck
item.description:
@mrduck wrote:

[quote=“zach55200, post:16, topic:417093”]Name cracks me up haha.

Age:15
Experience in java:9-12 months.
Position applying for:Server-sided coder.
Why should i choose you?:I’m pretty creative so I can pitch ideas and I can code just about anything.
Proof of work: Respawn-pk projects v1-2 (V3 is a side project this will be my main project if im picked.)
Msn:Zach55200@live.com[/quote]
I added you on MSN (note: Im status: offline mostly, just talk to me, I’ll get the messages on my iPhone anyway).

Further more, we’re working on the GFX. Thanks for the feedback! (we will keep a marijuana icon in it tho, since its our trademark)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Lil' Amsterdam {Apply Now!}
item.dc:creator: @mrduck mrduck
item.description:
@mrduck wrote:

[center]

209sp79.jpg885×185
[/center]

[font=verdana]Hello Moparscape Friends! I’m planning on starting a new server, a new project, a unique one! I will need a team for this since it will be alot of work to set it up and to keep it running. And I’ll be honest with you, I’m not that much of a coder. I can do some basic things, like NPC dialogues, shops, etc but I have bigger features in mind.
I do, however, have a lot of experience managing big servers, advertising them on the internet and managing a team.


So, some features I’m thinking of putting in are;
-Unique PvP-only characters (sealed of from the rest of the world)
-Unique extra features for donators
-Perfect economy
-Quests which require skill levels and are needed to use certain items
-Not too hard, yet challenging training / item getting
-Unique + basic minigames
-Loyal player rewards
-Actually listen to player suggestions
I have some more features in mind which we will discuss after we form a team.

Im planning on using a PI base, maybe using Vertigo (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,514816.0.html) since it is unique and we can expand it.
NOTE: THIS IS AN ENTIRE NEW PROJECT! Not just using that source, putting in 2 new shops in and changeing “Welcome to Vertigo!” to “Welcome to my crappy leechserver!”.


The goal is to create a new server, instead of another standard PI server with the same old NPC’s, same home, same way of getting money, etc. I’m hoping to be able to have enough income from the server to pay the monthly costs after a month or 3. Until then I will cover the costs of the host, the website, etc.
So, help me offer players a new, unique server!


Why would you join this team? I can offer you a team in which everyone has an equal vote and works together on a new, unique server. Ofcourse all team members will get Co-Owner status. And, since you are reading this, there’s a big chance you like to work on servers. So why not pick this one?


What do I need?

Server-Sided coder: 0/2
Client-Sided coder: 0/1
Webdesigner: 1/1
GFX designer: 0/1

Experience in java:
